articles.title: Mastering Python Errors, Exceptions, and Exception Handling: A Comprehensive Guide - Part One
articles.intro: In the Tiobe Index Report as of 2023, Python is the most widely used programming language. This is considerably so given the simplicity and versatility of the language. Now, as a developer, it is important to build robust applications that are not only functional but also efficient.

articles.title: Mastering Python Errors, Exceptions, and Exception Handling: A Comprehensive Guide - Part Two
articles.intro: In the previous article, we mentioned that in Python programming, there are two distinguishable Errors; syntax errors and exceptions. In this article, we are going to explore exceptions, taking a dive into the different exceptions and how to handle them.
